Title: I Have No Room in My Heart for Hate
Writer: Lilly Wachowski (created by), Lana Wachowski (created by), J. Michael Straczynski (created by), Lana Wachowski, J. Michael Straczynski
Actors: Doona Bae, Jamie Clayton, Tina Desai, Tuppence Middleton
Plot: Will asks an old friend for help as Riley embarks on a risky journey. Kala makes a troubling discovery. Sun has an intense encounter in the cemetery.
